languages.text: Эксплораторы оскорбились на решение Вольного Торговца и предприняли акцию возмездия.
The Explorators were outraged by the Rogue Trader's decision and responded with an act of vengeance.
languages.original_text: Эксплораторы оскорбились на решение Вольного Торговца и предприняли акцию возмездия.

traits.locale_text: The Explorators were outraged by the Rogue Trader's decision and responded with an act of vengeance.

languages.text: Les Explorators ont été outrés par la décision {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et ont répondu par un acte de vengeance.
languages.original_text: The Explorators were outraged by the Rogue Trader's decision and responded with an act of vengeance.

traits.locale_text: Les Explorators ont été outrés par la décision {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et ont répondu par un acte de vengeance.

languages.text: エクスプロレイターたちは自由開拓者の決断に憤慨し、復讐の行動に出た。
languages.original_text: The Explorators were outraged by the Rogue Trader's decision and responded with an act of vengeance.

traits.locale_text: エクスプロレイターたちは自由開拓者の決断に憤慨し、復讐の行動に出た。

languages.text: 开拓者对行商浪人的决定极为不满，并决定予以报复。
languages.original_text: The Explorators were outraged by the Rogue Trader's decision and responded with an act of vengeance.

traits.locale_text: 开拓者对行商浪人的决定极为不满，并决定予以报复。

languages.text: Los exploradores se indignaron por la decisión {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente y respondieron con un acto de venganza.
languages.original_text: The Explorators were outraged by the Rogue Trader's decision and responded with an act of vengeance.

traits.locale_text: Los exploradores se indignaron por la decisión {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente y respondieron con un acto de venganza.

languages.text: Die Exploratoren waren erzürnt über die Entscheidung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und haben mit einem Racheakt reagiert.
languages.original_text: The Explorators were outraged by the Rogue Trader's decision and responded with an act of vengeance.

traits.locale_text: Die Exploratoren waren erzürnt über die Entscheidung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und haben mit einem Racheakt reagiert.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in kararı, Keşiftörleri küplere bindirdi ve bir intikam eylemiyle karşılık verdiler.
languages.original_text: The Explorators were outraged by the Rogue Trader's decision and responded with an act of vengeance.
